UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Initial insights into structure-activity relationships of avian defensins.
Literature.Author: Derache C, Meudal H, Aucagne V, Mark KJ, Cadène M, Delmas AF, Lalmanach AC, Landon C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=0.19-0.53µM),Listeria monocytogenes EGD(MIC=0.11-0.34µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29740(MIC=0.35-3.03µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.73-1.40µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=0.26-0.87µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1.83-5.96µM)
